T02D2487:192b-3: rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D2487:192b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2487:192b-5: ltung ba bcu bzhi po ni dkyus su bsdebs pa bdun te /
T02D2487:192b-6: bdun po de dag la ltung ba'i ngo bo bdun dang /
T02D2487:192b-8: dngos po bcu bzhi zung phral na bcu bzhi po tshan tshan gsum mo //
T02D2487:192b-9: de la ltung ba dang po dang gnyis pa'i ngo bo dang rgyu gcig ste /
T02D2487:192b-10: bla ma la brnyas pa nyid bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa ste /
T02D2487:192b-12: bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2487:193a-3: des na rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bla ma tha
T02D2487:193a-4: mi dad pa'i phyir ltung ba gnyis ngo bo dang
T02D2487:193a-5: rgyu gcig brnyas pa'i yul bla ma de yang thun
T02D2487:193a-6: mong gi lam 'khor ba yid la byas pa 'di
T02D2487:193a-7: las blo log par byas pa shes shing byas pa
T02D2487:193a-8: gzo pa la brten nas byams pa dang snying rje
T02D2487:193a-9: brtan par byas pa de gnyis kyi stobs las byung
T02D2487:193a-10: ba'i byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas 'jug pa'i
T02D2487:193a-11: sdom pa dang ldan pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs //
T02D2487:193a-12: snying rje med cing khro la gdung //
T02D2487:193a-13: khengs shing chags la ma bsdams dang //
T02D2487:193a-14: spyoms dang bcas par mi bya'o //
T02D2487:193a-15: zhes gsungs pas thun mong gi lam gyi mi mthun pa de rnams las log nas /
T02D2487:193a-16: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dbang bzhi'i sgo nas lta ba dang /
T02D2487:193a-18: sgom pa gsum gyi man ngag dang ldan pa de yang dang yang du /
T02D2487:193a-19: goms par byas pas yon tan dang //
T02D2487:193a-20: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D2487:193a-21: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu med //
T02D2487:193a-22: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02D2487:193a-23: snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas //
T02D2487:193a-24: de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes //
T02D2487:193a-26: sngags bshad pa yi spyod pa shes //
T02D2487:193a-27: rab tu zhi dang dbang po dul//
T02D2487:193a-28: zhes bya bas de ltar yon bcu bzhi dang ldan
T02D2487:193a-29: pa lta ba rnam gnyis grub par gnas pa'i don
T02D2487:193a-30: dang / nges par grub pa'i thabs lnga dang /
T02D2487:193a-31: spyod pa rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02D2487:193a-32: dbang rnam pa bzhi'i man ngag dang ldan pa'i grub
T02D2487:193a-33: pa'i tshig gi nyams dang ldan pa'i bla ma zhes
T02D2487:193a-34: bya ba ste / de lta bu'i bla ma dam pa nye bar bsten pa'i sgo nas /
T02D2487:193a-35: slob ma de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D2487:193a-36: 'jug sems kyi sdom pa dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D2487:193a-38: mnyam par bzhag pas bla ma la //
T02D2487:193a-39: ci 'byor ba yis mchod byas la //
T02D2487:193a-40: gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te ;
T02D2487:193a-41: / byang chub sems sogs sdom pa ni //
T02D2487:193a-42: gal te bdag la phan 'dod na //
T02D2487:193a-43: sngags pas 'bad de gzung bar bya //
T02D2487:193a-44: zhes gsungs pas bla ma des dang po 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs yid la bya ba dang /
T02D2487:193a-45: skyabs su 'gro ba dang byams pa dang snying rje'i
T02D2487:193b-0: sgo nas byang chub tu sems @193b brtan par byas
T02D2487:193b-1: nas 'jug sems kyi sdom pa dang ldan pa la
T02D2487:193b-2: dbang bzhi snod du bsgrubs nas lta spyod sgom pa
T02D2487:193b-3: gsum gyi man ngag dang ldan par bsgrub pa de'i
T02D2487:193b-4: phyir ro // de nas sngags sogs sbyin pa yis //
T02D2487:193b-5: dam chos snod du byas nas so //
T02D2487:193b-7: de bla ma la rag las pas /
T02D2487:193b-8: dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brangs zhes //
T02D2487:193b-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gsungs par //
T02D2487:193b-10: shes nas dngos po thams cad kyis //
T02D2487:193b-11: bla ma yongs su mnyes par bya //
T02D2487:193b-12: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i bla ma de dus
T02D2487:193b-13: rtag tu phun sum tshogs pa mtha' dag gi 'byung
T02D2487:193b-14: gnas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas 'byin byed dngos grub
T02D2487:193b-15: thams cad kyi rag las pa yin pas de'i phyir
T02D2487:193b-16: / gdan bstabs pa dang ldang ba dang //
T02D2487:193b-17: don gyi bya ba sogs bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
T02D2487:193b-18: bla ma las ni dngos grub dang //
T02D2487:193b-19: mtho ris dang ni thar pa thob //
T02D2487:193b-21: mdun du dul bas 'dug par bya //
T02D2487:193b-22: zhes bya ba'i bar du bya ba mtha' dag dran
T02D2487:193b-23: pa dang shes bzhin gyis ma yengs par bya ba'i
T02D2487:193b-24: tshul gyis bla ma bsten par bya'o //
T02D2487:193b-25: de lta bu'i bla ma la brnyas na sangs rgyas thams cad la brnyas pa ste /
T02D2487:193b-26: de 'dra'i mgon la bsam bcas pas //
T02D2487:193b-27: slob mar gyur pas brnyas na ni ;
T02D2487:193b-28: / sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas pa ste //
T02D2487:193b-29: des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob //
T02D2487:193b-31: der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad //
T02D2487:193b-33: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2487:193b-34: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
T02D2487:193b-35: dge ba yongs su mi spyoms pa //
T02D2487:193b-36: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2487:193b-37: zhes pa de ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba kun gyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2487:193b-38: sbyong ba la sogs pa ni phal cher bla ma
T02D2487:193b-39: gser gling pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa las shes
T02D2487:193b-40: par bya'o // ltung ba de gnyis kyi rgyu ni
T02D2487:193b-41: bla ma grub pa thob pa'i tshig gi nyams dang
T02D2487:193b-42: bral pa rnams dang phrad pa'i dbang gis lam gyi
T02D2487:193b-43: snod du ma bsgrubs par dbang la sogs pa byas
T02D2487:193b-44: par bya'o // kyang / rtsa ba ma brtan pa'i dbang gis nges par 'dren mi nus shing /
T02D2487:193b-45: nges pa med pa'i phyir bla ma gtso bor mi byed de /
T02D2487:194a-0: de'i phyir slob dpon brnyas pa la sogs pa thams cad 'byung ste de ni log @194a * //
T02D2487:194a-1: par bstan cing bsgrub pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2487:194a-2: sngon du 'gro ba'i spyang ba gang yang med par
T02D2487:194a-3: dbang dang bskyed rdzogs kyi man ngag bstan du zin
T02D2487:194a-4: kyang rtsa ba med pa'i dbang gis myur du 'jig
T02D2487:194a-6: de bas na de gnyis ni bka' 'das dang gnyis kyi rgyu yin pas na ;
T02D2487:194a-8: rang nyid kyis lam ma mthong bas //
T02D2487:194a-9: ji lta bzhin du gzhan dag 'dren //
T02D2487:194a-10: long ba gnyis ni 'grogs gyur na //
T02D2487:194a-11: gnyis ka ltung bar the tshom med //
T02D2487:194a-14: sdig pa can gyi lam de yis //
T02D2487:194a-15: bgrod pa nyams pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2487:194a-16: zhes pas bla ma dam pa la brten par bya'o //
T02D2487:194a-17: spun la nyes pa brjod pa dang byams pa spong
T02D2487:194a-18: ba gnyis ltung ba'i ngo bo gcig la de 'byung
T02D2487:194a-20: de'i rgyu ni sngon du thun de /
T02D2487:194a-21: de'i phyir spun la nyes pa brjod cing sems can la byams pa 'dod pa dang /
T02D2487:194a-22: gces par 'dzin pa'i blo med la de'i dbang gis
T02D2487:194a-23: gnod cing smod pa la sogs pa'i rkyen phra mo
T02D2487:194a-24: mi bzod de / de'i phyir spun la nyes pa
T02D2487:194a-25: brjod cing sems can la byams pa spong ba des
T02D2487:194a-26: de gnyis ngo bo gcig ste gzhan la gnod par
T02D2487:194a-27: mi bzod de / 'dra bas so // byang chub
T02D2487:194a-28: sems spong dang grub pa'i mtha' smod pa gnyis rgyu
T02D2487:194a-30: rgyu ni byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis byang
T02D2487:194a-31: chub kyi sems brtan par ma byas par blangs su
T02D2487:194a-34: thams cad la ni lhag pa'i gnas //
T02D2487:194a-35: gang du thams cad 'jig pa ste //
T02D2487:194a-36: bskal pa bye ba stong du yang //
T02D2487:194a-37: yang dag bskyed pa'i dge ba che //
T02D2487:194a-38: byang chub sems ni bskyad pa yi //
T02D2487:194a-39: bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pas so //
T02D2487:194a-40: bskal pa bye bas 'byung ba ni //
T02D2487:194a-41: skad cig nyid la rnam par 'jig / de bas don de bsrungs pas ni //
T02D2487:194a-42: de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs //
T02D2487:194a-43: zhes 'byung bas byang chub sems de spangs pa dang /
T02D2487:194a-47: bla ma la brten nas dang /
T02D2487:194a-49: sems can la brten nas spong ba'o //
T02D2487:194a-50: tshad ni rten gsum po de la brten nas nyon
T02D2487:194a-51: mongs pa'i bsam pas g-yo sgyu la sogs pas nyin
T02D2487:194b-0: mtshan cha ci rigs par 'das @194b pa'o //
T02D2487:194b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsad nas 'byin pa ni nyes pa'o //
T02D2487:194b-2: gzhan gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi bar chad byas na yang nyes pa che bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2487:194b-3: de la rang gi theg pa ni thig pa chen po gnyis so //
T02D2487:194b-5: smod pa ni gong ma ltar mi sbyong zhing smod pa ste /
T02D2487:194b-6: rang mi gnas shing gzhan mi 'dzud pa'o //
T02D2487:194b-8: phung po smod pa gnyis rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste /
T02D2487:194b-9: rim gyis ma sbyangs pa'i phyir snod du ma gyur
T02D2487:194b-10: pa la gsang ba'i don grub par gnas pa'i don
T02D2487:194b-11: lta ba rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa bstan pas
T02D2487:194b-12: phung po lha'i bdag nyid la sogs pa bskyed pa'i
T02D2487:194b-13: go rims spong bas rgyu dang ngo bo gcig go
T02D2487:194b-15: lha yi gzugs ni bsgoms pa la //
T02D2487:194b-16: sems kyi brtson pa dag la ni //
T02D2487:194b-17: glegs bam tsam yang bstan pa ni //
T02D2487:194b-18: sbyin par mi bya shes bya ste //
T02D2487:194b-19: rdo rje ye shes rab spong bas //
T02D2487:194b-21: de yi dmyal ba'i rgyur gyur pas //
T02D2487:194b-23: de dang bdag gzhan phung ba ni //
T02D2487:194b-24: 'byung bas nges par bsrung bar bya //
T02D2487:194b-26: chos la yid gnyis za ba dang //
T02D2487:194b-27: sdug la byams sems gnyis rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste /
T02D2487:194b-28: de yang sems can thams cad rang bzhin dag pa
T02D2487:194b-29: 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gi rang bzhin du gcig
T02D2487:194b-30: pa la de gnyis la the tshom za ste /
T02D2487:194b-31: 'khor ba dang zhi ba'i phyag rgya chen po zung
T02D2487:194b-32: du ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis gdug pa can de
T02D2487:194b-33: gnod cing dmod pa la sogs ba byang chub kyi
T02D2487:194b-34: rkyen du byung pa la rdeg pa la sogs pa
T02D2487:194b-35: drag shul gyi sbyor bas phan pa ma yin par
T02D2487:194b-36: bsgrubs pas rgyu dang ngo bo gcig go //
T02D2487:194b-37: ming sogs bral ba'i chos la der rtog pa dang /
T02D2487:194b-38: dad ldan sems sun 'byin pa rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste /
T02D2487:194b-39: ming la sogs pa bral ba ni grub pa'i gnas
T02D2487:194b-40: pa'i don nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin 'od gsal
T02D2487:194b-41: ba la dngos po dang mtshan mar brtags pa'i rgyus
T02D2487:194b-42: de la dad pa'i sems can dbang po rab dang
T02D2487:194b-44: ma zhugs pa la mi 'jug la /
T02D2487:194b-45: zhugs pa bzlog cing brtan par mi byed pas so //
T02D2487:194b-46: dam tshig mi bsten pa dang shes rab smod pa gnyis kyang /
T02D2487:195a-0: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig @195a * //
T02D2487:195a-1: mi bsten pa ni shes rab smod pa'i rgyu yin te /
T02D2487:195a-2: de la smod pa nyid de spong ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D2487:195a-3: des na dang por bla ma grub pa thob pa'i
T02D2487:195a-4: tshig gi nyams dang ldan pa brtags la legs par
T02D2487:195a-5: blang gi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D2487:195a-7: bla ma dang ni slob ma dag / mtshungs par dam tshig nyams gyur pas //
T02D2487:195a-8: dpa' bos dang por slob dpon dang //
T02D2487:195a-9: slob ma'i 'brel pa brtag par bya //
T02D2487:195a-11: de ltar ltung ba de rnams las 'das pa na
T02D2487:195a-12: nyes pa bstan pa ni slob dpon la smod pa
T02D2487:195a-13: de zhes pa ni mtshon pa'i don te /
T02D2487:195a-14: ltung ba gzhan la nyes pa 'dra bar shes par bya ba'i lci yang ni yod de /
T02D2487:195a-15: de'i nyes pa ni yams dang zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig go //
T02D2487:195a-16: rgyal po me dang zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig go //
T02D2487:195a-17: de phyir nam yang tshigs su bcad pa gsum mo //
T02D2487:195a-18: gal te bsam pa'i sgo nas nyams na bla ma'i
T02D2487:195a-19: spyan sngar mandala la sogs pas mchod la nyes pa
T02D2487:195a-20: ming gis bshags te phyis bsdam zhing bla ma la
T02D2487:195a-21: sangs rgyas kyi blo nyis 'gyur du bslab ste /
T02D2487:195a-22: de'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir bla ma la ni zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig go //
T02D2487:195a-23: de bzhin du ltung ba lhag ma rnams kyang bsam
T02D2487:195a-24: pa'i brag gis bskang bar bya'o des na dang por
T02D2487:195a-25: bla ma legs par brtag cing legs par bsten la
T02D2487:195a-26: / de nas snod du bsgrub par gsol ba gdab /
T02D2487:195a-27: des kyang rjes su brtse ba'i sgo nas snod du bsgrubs te /
T02D2487:195a-28: dang po 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang /
T02D2487:195a-29: lha dang bla ma la brten du gzhug go //
T02D2487:195a-30: de nas thun mong pa'i skyabs 'gro la brten la /
T02D2487:195a-31: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa brten du gzhug /
T02D2487:195a-32: de nas khyad par gyi skyabs 'gro la brten nas
T02D2487:195a-33: byang chub kyi sems brtan du gzhug de nas 'jug
T02D2487:195a-34: pa'i sdom pa legs par byin la dbang bzhi'i sgo
T02D2487:195a-35: nas lta spyod sgom gsum gyi rtogs pa bsgrub po
T02D2487:195a-36: // de nas rtog pa dang mthun pa'i lam la sbyar te /
T02D2487:195a-37: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dus su bla ma dang lha tha mi dad pa la tshogs bsags /
T02D2487:195a-38: ltung ba dang po'i rgyu spangs /
T02D2487:195a-39: go rims de rnams dbang po rab kyis chos thams
T02D2487:195a-40: cad zung 'jug tu rtogs pa sgrub pa'i thabs su
T02D2487:195b-0: shes par bya'o // 'bring dang tha mas @195b tha
T02D2487:195b-1: mal pa'i rtog pa zlog pa'i thabs su shes par
T02D2487:195b-2: bya ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pas ltung ba
T02D2487:195b-3: gnyis pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pa dang drug
T02D2487:195b-4: pa dang bcu gnyis pa'i rgyu spangs /
T02D2487:195b-5: thun mong gi lam byams pa dang snying rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2487:195b-6: thun mong ma yin pa'i lam rnal 'byor dang bdag
T02D2487:195b-7: dang gnas bsrung bas ltung ba gsum pa dang bzhi
T02D2487:195b-8: pa dang lnga pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa'i
T02D2487:195b-9: rgyu spangs / de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la
T02D2487:195b-10: brten nas chos thams cad 'od gsal du rtogs pa
T02D2487:195b-11: rgyu spangs / bsgrubs nas / bdud rtsi lnga la
T02D2487:195b-12: sogs pa'i dam tshig brten pas bcu gsum pa dang
T02D2487:195b-13: bcu bzhi pa dang bcu gcig pa'i rgyu spangs /
T02D2487:195b-14: yang na lha la gsang ba dang shes rab dang
T02D2487:195b-15: bzhi pa blangs pas bcu bzhi pa dang bcu gsum
T02D2487:195b-16: pa'i rgyu spangs / de ltar na bcu bzhi po
T02D2487:195b-17: rnams mnyam gzhag gi las kyi rim pa las 'dus
T02D2487:195b-18: pas rjes kyi kyang de'i bdag nyid du bya dgos
T02D2487:195b-19: pa'i nges pa bskyed cing brtan par bya'o //
T02D2487:195b-20: dngos gzhi'i dbang du byas nas ltung ba re re
T02D2487:195b-21: la ltung ba'i ngos 'dzin dang rkyen gang gis byung
T02D2487:195b-23: tshul ji ltar mi 'byin pa'i thabs so //
T02D2487:195b-24: bde gshegs bka' ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa nas byas zhes dang /
T02D2487:195b-26: byams snying rje dang 'jug pa'i sdom pa'i bar du brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D2487:195b-27: khyad par can dbang rnam pa bzhis snod du bsgrubs
T02D2487:195b-28: nas lta ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ni bde
T02D2487:195b-29: gshegs kyi bka'o // 'das pa ni ma gus pa dang /
T02D2487:195b-32: nyon mongs pa mang ba'i dbang gis so //
T02D2487:195b-33: des na bla ma'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa brtan
T02D2487:195b-34: par mi byed par nyin mtshan gyi cha 'das pa
T02D2487:195b-35: ni ltung ba'o // rkyen ni ma dad pa la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D2487:195b-36: nyes pa ni sngar yams dang zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ste /
T02D2487:195b-37: bla ma'i skabs su bka' las 'das pa dang shes rab smod pa zhes re re la sbyar ro //
T02D2487:195b-38: mi 'byung ba'i thabs ni bla mas bstan pa'i lam
T02D2487:195b-39: dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mar me dang chu'i
T02D2487:195b-41: spun ni sbyor ba gcig pa dang /
T02D2487:195b-42: de las gzhan pa dang sems can mtha' dag go //
T02D2487:196a-1: brjod pa'i yul la brda phrad cing nyin mtshan gyi sum cha 'das na ltung ba'o //
T02D2487:196a-2: rkyen ni yul gsum po gang yang rung bas sems dang mthun par ma byas pa dang /
T02D2487:196a-3: mi byed pa'i dbang gis zhe sdang dang phrag dog
T02D2487:196a-4: gam nyon mongs pa gang yang rung pa dang mtshungs
T02D2487:196a-5: par khro ba'o // mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni khro
T02D2487:196a-6: ba'i rkyen nye bar gnas pa'i tshe byas pa shes
T02D2487:196a-7: pa la sogs pa byams pa yid la bya ba
T02D2487:196a-8: par khro ba'o // dang / yang na chos thams cad skye med du yid la bya ba'o //
T02D2487:196a-9: byams pa ni byas pa shes pa'i sgo nas sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2487:196a-10: spong ba ni phan pa ma yin par bsgrubs pas nyin mtshan gyi cha 'das na ltung ba'o //
T02D2487:196a-11: rkyen ni gong ma ltar yul gsum la brten nas
T02D2487:196a-12: bdag gi bsam pa dang mthun par mi byed pa
T02D2487:196a-13: dang / ma byas pa'i dbang gis phan pa ma yin pa bsgrub cing spong ba'o //
T02D2487:196a-14: mi 'byung ba'i thabs ni rkyen nye bar gnas pa'i
T02D2487:196a-15: dus su de la ched du gtad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2487:196a-16: byams pa yid la bya ba 'am zung 'jug tu
T02D2487:196a-17: shes par bya'o // byang chub kyi sems ni sems can gyi don du rdo rje 'chang 'dod pa'o //
T02D2487:196a-18: de spong ba ni yul gyi dbang gis gsum ste /
T02D2487:196a-19: bla ma dang rdo rje spun dang sems can la
T02D2487:196a-20: g-yo sgyu spyod pas yon tan thob par bya snyam
T02D2487:196a-21: pa dang / don dor bar nyin mtshan gyi cha 'das pa'o //
T02D2487:196a-22: rkyen ni snga ma ltar ro //
T02D2487:196a-23: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni mi mthun pa'i rkyen nye
T02D2487:196a-24: bar gnas pa'i dus su phan yon dang nyes dmigs
T02D2487:196a-25: shes pas byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2487:196a-26: yang na skye ba med pa yid la bya'o //
T02D2487:196a-27: rang gi grub pa'i mtha' ni theg pa chen po rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2487:196a-28: gzhan gyi ni nyan thos dang bse ru'o //
T02D2487:196a-29: he badzra 'dus pa'i le'u ltar rim gyis mi sbyong bar smod pas nyin mtshan 'das pa'o //
T02D2487:196a-30: rkyen ni bla ma dam tshig nyams pa dang bral
T02D2487:196a-31: ba rnams dang phrad pas lam rim gyis spyang ba
T02D2487:196a-32: rnams la smod cing khro ba'o //
T02D2487:196a-33: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni blo rim gyis bslabs pas theg pa gcig tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2487:196a-34: yongs su ma smin pa ni lam rim gyis ma sbyangs pa'o //
T02D2487:196a-35: gsang ba ni grub pa gnas pa'i don nam mkha' dang 'dra bar lta ba gnyis so//
T02D2487:196b-0: @196b sgrogs pa ni lus ngag gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan 'das na'o //
T02D2487:196b-1: rkyen ni ma sbyangs pa dang phrad pa'i dbang gis so //
T02D2487:196b-2: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni yul de lta bu dang
T02D2487:196b-3: phrad pa na blo'i bye brag dris nas de dang
T02D2487:196b-4: mthun par bya'o // phung po smod pa ni bskyed pa'i go rims mtha' dag gzung ngo //
T02D2487:196b-5: smod pa ni de ma bsgoms par nyin mtshan 'das na'o //
T02D2487:196b-6: rkyen ni zab mo ston pa'i lung dang yongs su 'dzin pa ngan pa lags so //
T02D2487:196b-7: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni lha sgom pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-8: rang bzhin dag pa ni lta ba gnyis so //
T02D2487:196b-9: so ma nyi za ba ni de gnyis kyi rtog pa ma skyes pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-10: de'i bdag gnyid du rtog pa med par nyin mtshan 'das na'o //
T02D2487:196b-11: rkyen bla ma dam pa dang bral pas dngos por lta ba'i dbang gis so //
T02D2487:196b-12: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni bla ma dam pa'i ngag la brten nas lta ba goms par bya'o //
T02D2487:196b-13: gdug pa can ni mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams so //
T02D2487:196b-14: bdag la gnod pa'i dbang gis zhe sdang gis bslang
T02D2487:196b-15: nas phan pa ma yin pa drag po byed pa
T02D2487:196b-17: rkyen ni nyes par byas pa'i dbang gis so //
T02D2487:196b-18: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni bzod pa bsgom pa ste bdud phyir bzlog pa'i lung las shes par bya'o //
T02D2487:196b-19: ming sogs bral ba'i chos ni 'od gsal ba dang zung du 'jug pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-20: de rtogs pa ni de gnyis kyi rang bzhin dang
T02D2487:196b-21: mi mthun par gzhan du rtogs pas nyin mtshan 'das
T02D2487:196b-22: pa'o // rkyen ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad pa'o ;
T02D2487:196b-23: / mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni de'i gdams pa las so //
T02D2487:196b-24: dad ldan ni lam rim gyis ma sbyangs kyang grub par gnas pa'i don la 'dod pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-25: sun 'byin pa ni ma bstan pa dang log par bstan pas so //
T02D2487:196b-26: rkyen ni mos pa'i gang zag dang phrad pas so //
T02D2487:196b-27: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni rtog pa dang sbyar te chos bstan pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-28: dam tshig ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-29: mi ston pa ni mi gtsang ba'i blos dor te dus 'das pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-30: rkyen ni rdzas nye bar gnas pa'o //
T02D2487:196b-31: mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni mi rtog pa'i sems kyis so //
T02D2487:196b-32: nyes pa 'di rnams lci yang yod kyang gnod pa ni 'dra'o //
T02D2487:196b-33: ci'i phyir zhe na rtsa ba'i ltung ba yin pas so //
T02D2487:196b-34: sngags pas 'di dag spangs nas ni //
T02D2487:197a-2: zhes bya ba ni spang bya spangs pa'i yon tan no //
T02D2487:197a-3: gzhan du dam tshig las nyams na //
T02D2487:197a-4: nyams pas bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur //
T02D2487:197a-5: de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing //
T02D2487:197a-6: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro //
T02D2487:197a-7: zhes bya ba ni nyams pa'i nyes pa mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D2487:197a-8: de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni //
T02D2487:197a-9: bdag nyid ma 'khrul shes par bya //
T02D2487:197a-10: zhes pa ni bag bya ba la bslab pa'o //
T02D2487:197a-11: dbang bskur nas ltung ba bcu bzhi pa dang bla
T02D2487:197a-12: ma lnga bcu gang 'dod pa'i sgrub thabs dag ni
T02D2487:197a-13: don rgyas par ston pa yin pas nges par nan
T02D2487:197a-14: tan gyis bslabs te gzhan du na bla ma'i nyes
T02D2487:197a-15: pa'o // de ltar bcu bzhi po bsdu na gsum ste /
T02D2487:197a-16: thun mong gi byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa dang /
T02D2487:197a-17: khyad par gyi byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa dang /
T02D2487:197a-18: de gnyis ka mi nyams par byed pa'o //
T02D2487:197a-19: ltung ba dang po dang gnyis ba ni gnyis ka mi nyams par byed pa'o //
T02D2487:197a-23: grub pa'i mtha' smod pa dang /
T02D2487:197a-24: gdug la byams pa spong ba ste /
T02D2487:197a-25: lnga po de dag ni thun mong gi sems mi nyams par byed pa ste /
T02D2487:197a-26: de bas na 'bad pas bsrung ngo //
T02D2487:197a-29: dag pa'i chos la yid gnyis dang //
T02D2487:197a-30: ming sogs bral la der rtog dang //
T02D2487:197a-32: dam tshig mi bsten pa dang /
T02D2487:197a-33: shes rab smod pa de rnams spangs pas khyad par
T02D2487:197a-34: gyi byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa'o
T02D2487:197a-35: ; / yang de ni lta spyod sgom gsum gyi rang bzhin yang yin te /
T02D2487:197a-37: ming sogs bral la der rtog spangs pas lta ba rnam gnyis rtogs pa'o //
T02D2487:197a-38: dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi
T02D2487:197a-39: pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pa
T02D2487:197a-40: dang brgyad pa dang bcu pa'i dgu spangs pas sgom
T02D2487:197a-43: dam tshig mi bsten pa dang /
T02D2487:197a-44: shes rab smod pa gsum gyis dgu spangs shing sbyangs pas spyod pa'o //
T02D2487:197a-45: de gsum ma spangs bar bsgoms pas bka' 'da' dang /
T02D2487:197b-0: bla ma brnyas pa ma spangs pa @197b yin no //
T02D2487:197b-1: de bas na bcu dang lnga bcu la nan tan
T02D2487:197b-2: yang dang yang du bya ste dngos grub thams cad
T02D2487:197b-3: kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2487:197b-4: nyams na nyes pa thams cad kyang 'byung ngo //
T02D2487:197b-5: de ltar ma yin par sngags tshig tsam gyis man ngag bstan nas //
T02D2487:197b-6: bla mar khas 'che ba ltung ba'i snod du bsgrubs na mi dge pa'i rgyu byas pas /
T02D2487:197b-7: mi dge ba'i bdag po'i rkyen zhes bya /
T02D2487:197b-10: slu bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste skyon mang du mi brjod do //
T02D2487:197b-11: de lta bu'i bla ma dang slob ma de yang
T02D2487:197b-12: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi phung
T02D2487:197b-13: po rnams rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i rgyus bsgrubs pas
T02D2487:197b-14: ngan song sgrub pa'i thabs dang rkyen des dug dang
T02D2487:197b-16: de bas na bla ma dam pa bsten pa gces par rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2487:197b-17: dam pa'i grogs dang bla ma dang //
T02D2487:197b-18: ma phrad srid par 'khyams pa las //
T02D2487:197b-19: phan phyir bla ma'i lung bzhin du ;
T02D2487:197b-20: / bris pas de dag la phan shog /'di mthong tsam gyis skye bo rnams //
T02D2487:197b-21: chos la nan tan bya ba'i rgyur //
T02D2487:197b-22: gyur nas bla ma gtsor byed cing //
T02D2487:197b-23: sgrub la nan tan byed pa'i rgyur //
T02D2487:197b-24: skal ngag skye bo rnams dang phrad pa na //
T02D2487:197b-25: rang skyon dbang gis smod par byed mod kyi //
T02D2487:197b-26: drang srong chen po'i lung ni su zhig spong //
T02D2487:197b-27: de phyir de dag la yang gnod ma gyur //
T02D2487:197b-28: gsang ba bla na med pa yi //
T02D2487:197b-29: rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i //
T02D2487:197b-30: rnal 'byor pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir //
T02D2487:197b-31: gsal byed man ngag bkod pa'o //
T02D2487:197b-32: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D2487:197b-33: kyi bslab pa gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag ces
T02D2487:197b-34: bya ba slob dpon rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad pa'i rtsa
T02D2487:197b-35: ba'i ltung ba'i 'grel pa mkhas pa chen po d'i
T02D2487:197b-36: pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas gsungs
